      • addAdministrator

        public void addAdministrator(Administrator administrator)
        Adds the specified IVoteAdministrator to the list of Administrators associated with this IVoteService.
        Parameters:
        administrator - the Administrator to be added to this IVoteService

      • addStudent

        public void addStudent(Student student)
        Adds the specified IVoteStudent to the list of Students associated with this IVoteService.
        Parameters:
        student - the Student to be added to this IVoteService

      • recordStudentResponse

        public void recordStudentResponse(Student student,
                                  Response response)
        Records the Student and associated Response for the current Question of the current Administrator. If a Student has already submitted a Response, then the previous Response is overwritten.
        Parameters:
        student - the Student whose Response is to be recorded
        response - the Response that is to be recorded

      • printStatistics

        public void printStatistics()
        Prints the candidate answers for the current Question and the submission results for each possible answer to the console.

      • printQuestionAndResponses

        public void printQuestionAndResponses()
        Prints the current Question and its list of candidate answers to the console.

      • recordStudentResponseFromConsole

        public void recordStudentResponseFromConsole()
        Records the Student and associated Response for the current Question of the current Administrator based on user input from the console. If a Student has already submitted a Response, then the previous Response is overwritten.

      • generateResponseFromConsole

        public Response generateResponseFromConsole()
        Generates a Response based on user input from the console.
        Returns:
        the Response that is generated from user input

      • gatherMultipleStudentResponsesFromConsole

        public void gatherMultipleStudentResponsesFromConsole()
        Generates multiple Students and corresponding Responses based on user input from the console.

      • administratorSetupInConsole

        public Administrator administratorSetupInConsole()
        Returns an Administrator whose current Question and candidate answers are configured from user input from the console.
        Returns:
        the Administrator with current Question and candidate answers that are configured from user input from the console

      • configureQuestionTypeFromConsole

        public Question configureQuestionTypeFromConsole(Question question)
        Configures Question as either a single-choice or multiple-choice question based on user input from the console.
        Parameters:
        question - the Question whose type is to be configured
        Returns:
        the question with specified type configuration

      • configureQuestionFromConsole

        public Question configureQuestionFromConsole(Question question)
        Configures Question based on user input from the console.
        Parameters:
        question - the Question that is to be configured
        Returns:
        the Question configured with specified question that is to be asked

      • configureCandidateResponsesFromConsole

        public Question configureCandidateResponsesFromConsole(Question question)
        Configures the Question's candidate responses based on user input from the console.
        Parameters:
        question - the Question that is to be configured
        Returns:
        the Question configured with the specified candidate answers
